title: Saturnin
occurrences: Last week I hired a man-servant. His name is Saturnin.
- Such people don't exist. - Where would you place Saturnin?
- Such people don't exist. - Where would you place Saturnin?
Thank you, Saturnin.
Mr. Saturnin said you're going to the North Pole, he's cleaning your weapons.
Where did you learn to play tennis, Saturnin?
- Too many cooks spoil the broth. - This is my man-servant, Saturnin.
- What's happening, Saturnin? - I fear we've encountered a weir!
Don't trifle with me, Saturnin. Is it really that bad?
Saturnin is behaving like a lout!
Unlike some, Saturnin was invited to this house.
Saturnin is teaching grandpa jujitsu.
- Tumitsu, Saturnin? - Haisatsu is better, sir.
We agreed that Saturnin would pursue Milou relentlessly.
Saturnin told me about his last place of employment.
- All the food's disappeared! - Let's ask Saturnin.
No-one suspects Saturnin. You make your bed, you lie in it.
Just as long as we don't end up serving Saturnin.
- Call Saturnin! - I told Saturnin to take the food.
Great idea, Saturnin.
I'd like Saturnin to stay with me. We've got a plan.
